name: Royal doors
slogan: Blending the glory of royalty and imagination
description: Whether you need an entrance, an external or internal door, or a door for your wardrobe or utility closet, the ROYAL door is ideal in any situation. At our showroom, you can buy a fully finished door that can be fitted for you, or you can have one designed and custom-built especially for your space.
size: Door + Frame 63-100 cm, Door Only 55-95 cm
